EmailTemplate.description: Inviting installers to join us at solar power NY
EmailTemplate.name: Solar Power NY Invite11.29
EmailTemplate.subject: BlueWave Invites You to Solar Power NY!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Join us at Solar Power New York!
BlueWave is exhibiting at Solar Power New York. Let us know if you will be attending, too, so that we can invite you to drinks with our team on 12/11!
BlueWave is exhibiting at the New York Solar Conference to celebrate that we will be launching our residential loans in New York on December 7th.
Why attend? Solar Power New York is the event for solar policy updates and opportunities to network with regional companies for New York State. See the agenda here.
More info:
This event is powered by SEIA & SEPA. All proceeds from the event support the expansion of the U.S. solar energy market through both associations' year-round research and education activities, and through SEIA's advocacy efforts.
To learn more conference highlights click here.
To learn more about BlueWave please visit our website.
We hope to see you next week! - All of us here at BlueWave
